item.description:
This is going to be a Urban Boston Walking workshop with professional Photographer and Boston native Steve Dunwell. The Workshop and tour will begin at 8:30am and run until 1:30pm.

The group will begin its tour in the historic Haymarket/Faneuil Hall Marketplace. From here the group will make its way into Copley square. Along the way Steve will show you areas and angles of Boston sometimes overlooked. Along the way Steve will work with you all on getting the most out of your photographs.

We will have more details to follow on exactly where we will be heading during the tour.

Please take a moment to visit Steve's Website to get an idea of what to expect during your walking workshop tour.

http://www.vimeo.com/...

The cost of this Workshop is $75.00 for a group of 12 or less or $60 for groups up to 20 photographers.
item.name: Urban Boston Walking Workshop with Steve Dunwell
